description:
ABC sources confirm that a major recurring character will debut on the Revenge Season 3 premiere, as viewers will meet Victoria's first born son, who was put up for adoption when he was six months old.ABC电视台的知情人士跟我们确认了一个重要的循环角色将会在《复仇》第三季第一集中出现，而这个人就是Victoria亲生的大儿子，这个儿子六个月的时候 就被别人领养。

Look for the character to be charming, but also possess a dark side. No word yet on what actors are up for the role.这个角色非常有魅力，另外却有着阴暗的一面。目前还没有消息显示这个角色将会由哪位演员来演绎。

Dr. Jorge Lopez, a South American doctor, will also debut on the premiere. Sources say he will called upon regarding Ashley...另外一个南美医生Jorge Lopez也将会在《复仇》第三季第一集出现。相关人士透露，这个角色将会呼吁大家注意Ashley...

title: 《复仇》第三季将会迎来两个新角色
